body_html:
I was also able to compile the most recent version of master with the following:
bazel build -c opt --copt=-mavx --copt=-mavx2 --copt=-mfma --copt=-mfpmath=both --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

Also, I find it odd that the nightly build doesn't seem to be working. I would think it's using similar commands.
body_text:
I was also able to compile the most recent version of master with the following:
bazel build -c opt --copt=-mavx --copt=-mavx2 --copt=-mfma --copt=-mfpmath=both --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
Also, I find it odd that the nightly build doesn't seem to be working. I would think it's using similar commands.
body:
I was also able to compile the most recent version of master with the following:
`bazel build -c opt --copt=-mavx --copt=-mavx2 --copt=-mfma --copt=-mfpmath=both --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`

Also, I find it odd that the [nightly build](https://ci.tensorflow.org/view/Nightly/job/nightly-matrix-cpu-mavx/) doesn't seem to be working. I would think it's using similar commands.
